name: ColorSettingsPolicy
shortdesc: The policy for handling mismatched CMYK configurations.

property.name: COLOR_POLICY_OFF
property.shortdesc: Turns off color management for documents whose profiles do not match the working space. For imported colors, numeric values override color appearance.

property.name: PRESERVE_EMBEDDED_PROFILES
property.shortdesc: Preserves embedded color profiles in newly opened documents.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_WORKING_SPACE
property.shortdesc: Converts newly opened documents to the current working space. For imported colors, color appearance overrides numeric values.

property.name: COMBINATION_OF_PRESERVE_AND_SAFE_CMYK
property.shortdesc: Preserves raw color numbers and ignores embedded color profiles.
